string.name: my_posts_empty
string.translation_description: Text that is shown on the 'My Posts' screen when no posts have been saved by user

resources.string: You don\'t have any saved posts

string.name: add_post
string.translation_description: Button text that prompts user to navigate to the Posts List to add posts to their empty posts list.

string.name: saved_posts_title
string.translation_description: Title for the 'Saved posts' screen where the user can see the list of saved posts.

string.name: posts_list_title
string.translation_description: Title for the 'All posts' screen where the user can see the list of all available posts.

string.name: post_details_title
string.translation_description: Title for the plant details screen where the user can see the details for a specific post.

string.name: saved_post
string.translation_description: Message that user sees when opened post is saved
